data.Title: OpenAI Launches SearchGPT, an AI-Powered Search Prototype
data.Description: OpenAI is launching a test version of its long-awaited search engine, SearchGPT, which will summarize the information found on websites, including news sites.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Gets AI-Powered Search Results
data.Description: Microsoft is rolling out a new search results page that prioritizes generative AI summaries over traditional web results, in a move similar to Google's AI Overviews.

data.Title: Reddit Blocks Bing and Other Search Engines From Crawling
data.Description: Reddit updated its robots.txt file to block most search engines and AI crawlers from accessing its content, including Microsoft Bing, but not Google.

data.Title: Google to Test Ads in AI Overviews
data.Description: Google will soon test placing ads within AI Overviews, in addition to the existing ads above and below the feature.

data.Title: Google Reports Strong Q2 2024 Earnings
data.Description: Alphabet, Google's parent company, reported strong Q2 2024 earnings, with ad revenue up 11% to $64.62 billion and overall revenue up 14%.

data.Title: Google's Cookie Deprecation Delayed
data.Description: Google has reversed its plans to fully deprecate third-party cookies from its Chrome browser, prompting mixed reactions from the ad industry.
